item.title: Reframer: Qualitative data analysis system
item.description: Reframer is a collaborative web app for collecting and analyzing qualitative data. You start by capturing data into the app—things like customer feedback, free text responses in surveys, emails, interviews, and usability test data. The system then uses the aggregated information and provides a view reframed with quantitative values based on a significance rating that team members apply. These values can also be used to prioritize issues to assess feasibility.
